title: Chocolate Brown Full-Length A-Line Maxi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a chocolate brown full-length A-line maxi dress, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, subtle matte sheen, soft drape, short cap sleeves, scoop neckline, waist seam with matching fabric belt, concealed side zipper, no model, no mannequin, apparel-only
techpack: Full-length A-line maxi dress in chocolate brown cotton sateen with polyester blend lining. Cap sleeves, scoop neckline, waist seam with self-fabric belt, concealed side zipper on left seam, topstitch detailing along bodice and skirt panels. Hem finished with blind stitch.
